Package mireka.mailaddress

Interface Summary
Recipient All implementing classes must implement the RemotePartContainingRecipient interface except the special global postmaster recipient.
RemotePart  
RemotePartContainingRecipient The special "Postmaster" recipient (without domain name) is the only Recipient which doesn't implement this interface
 

Class Summary
Address Corresponds to the Mailbox production in RFC 5321.
AddressLiteral  
AddressRecipient  
Domain  
DomainPart  
DomainPostmaster represents the special "Postmaster@"domain recipient.
GlobalPostmaster represents the special "Postmaster" recipient.
LocalPart This implementation does case-insensitive comparisons using the US locale.
MailAddressFactory
